subject: How to give an introduction of JUnit?
msgSnippet: Hi, I m quite new to JUnit. I m having to give a presentation of JUnit in more than a week. The focus is the new features in version 4. Nevertheless, I think I
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm quite new to JUnit. I'm having to give a presentation of JUnit in
more than a week. The focus is the new features in version 4.
Nevertheless, I think I will want to have 1 - 3 beginning slides
briefly introducing the tool which consist of the following information:

- General Introduction.
- Historical, current and (possibly) future development.

Could anyone point me some source for the second point? (how, when, on
what circumstance the tool originated? How has it evolved so far?
What's the current state? What's the big roadmap picture? Its plan for
future development? Which future direction would it take? What are the
most critical features that will probably be added (or needed) in the
next release?...). Answers to such questions would be highly appreciated.

Thanks,
David.
